page.title: 03LOCAL NEWS
page.content: swim has taken place at the Gillingham Social Centre in aid of the David Pinder Appeal. A recent death in Gillingham was of an eleven-year-old schoolgirl who was knocked down by a car at the end of Wyke Road on 26th April while on her way to school. Another death was of Charlie Howe, a county councillor and author of a popular book about the locality who died recently of cancer. Mr Webster the present Headmaster of Gillingham Comprehensive School,is to retire this year after 28 years of service to the school. During the past year vandalism has occurred on the school premises with windows being smashed for no apparent reason. The teachers action over a pay dispute has affected the school with three-day strikes and a withdrawl of supervision during lunchtime.
